banner.secondary: rhythm is just a tap away

about.title: About
about.text:
This is a fan-made website dedicated to gather everything related to osu!droid in one place, with the goal of delivering the best possible user experience.
Our aim is to provide a comprehensive one-stop site that caters to all your needs about the game, where you can find everything from leaderboards and news to guides, player statistics, and much more!

Osu!droid is a free-to-play circle-clicking rhythm game for Android, inspired by the popular rhythm game osu!
The project is developed by a group of passionate fans, with the support of foreign contributors.
The game is open-source and is continually evolving.

Whether you're seeking to enhance your skills, engage with other osu!droid fans, or stay up-to-date with the latest news, we offer something for everyone.
We invite you to explore our thriving and passionate community, participate in our events, and enjoy the game to the fullest!
